pr_title: [2.35.0] Tracker Importer audit feature is now present

timeline.message: fix: audit for event importer are now present

timeline.bodyText: minor: can we add a short Javadoc to explain the reason for this Post processor
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText: Sure, I'll add it, thank you
replies.author: gnespolino
